apihelp-userstatus-summary: API for handling social status messages
apihelp-userstatus-param-what: What to do? Verb + subject, i.e. addnetworkstatus to add a status to a network page, deletestatus to delete a status message, etc.
apihelp-userstatus-param-count: Display this many status updates in the returned feed
apihelp-userstatus-param-vote: 1 to "upvote" a status message, -1 to "downvote" instead
